title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Traveling Trunks
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Traveling Trunks                Traveling Trunk       The park has Traveling Trunks available to schools that cannot bring their students to the park or for teachers who would like to do pre-visit lessons with their students.  The trunks can be picked up from Kings Mountain NMP or shipped to the school, however the trunks are rather large. To request a trunk call the park at 864-936-7921. Just some of the items included in the trunk are: -maps of the Kings Mountain Battlefield and other battles fought in the Carolinas -colonial Currency -colonial Flags -colonial Music CD with songbook -photos of Kings Mountain Battlefield along with monuments and leaders of the battle -colonial games -soldier accoutrements -colonial clothes - 1 set each for men, women, boys and girls
